about.me: Single pool operator working for a real decentralization. 24/7 live support.
about.server: 3X Lenovo M700-Small low energy servers (i5 6600, 12GB ram, 256GB SSD + 500GB for disaster recovery), Gigabit fiber optic connection and UPS for about 2 hours of power backup.
about.company: Carden Pool is a premium staking pool to make your ADA's worth. We are two Single Pool Operators (SPO) that created and actively maintaining this bare metal pool, with the aim to partecipate to a real network decentralization. The whole infrastructure stands out its low CO2 foot print, thanks to the meager consumption of 45 W/h! Itâ€™s a mission driven pool where 10% of pool operator rewards will be devolved to ForestaMI project, with the aim to reforest the city of Milan and its region.
